author: S P
text:
Six months after the murder of engineering graduate V. Gokulraj (23) of Omalur, whose beheaded body was found on railway track near Pallipalayam on June 24, 2015, the Crime Branch Criminal Investigation Department (CB-CID) filed the charge sheet before the Chief Judicial Magistrate S. Malarmathy here on Thursday.

ADSP G. Stalin filed the 725-page charge sheet, naming 17 persons as accused in the case with S. Yuvaraj and his driver P. Arun named as accused one and two respectively. The charge sheet is said to have named over 50 witnesses, with details of clues that could be vital for the case. With the filing of charge sheet, the case is expected to come for trail soon. So far, 17 persons were arrested of which five were released on bail while seven were detained under the Goondas Act.
title: Charge sheet filed in Gokulraj murder case
